KeysToEntries.Doric.Intro.1: I don't like this place, it's creepy and weird. Had to whack several zombies with my hammer and now it's got this weird purple ooze on it that won't wash off.
KeysToEntries.Doric.Intro.2: Still, I'm betting there's something interesting waiting around here. There are vaults in this place and they must be loaded with dragonkin secrets.
KeysToEntries.Doric.Intro.3: Who knows what you might find? I discovered one vault, and I was all geared up to visit, but it's locked down tight. Hey, I know, if you get a chance why don't you take a look? Let me know what you find inside.
KeysToEntries.Doric.QuestStarted.NoProgress.1: Taken a look in that locked vault yet? There must be a trick to it. Those dragonkin were a smart lot, secretive... and arrogant as heck.
KeysToEntries.Doric.QuestStarted.NoProgress.2: If you can find your way inside, let me know if you discover anything interesting.
KeysToEntries.Doric.FoundStatue.1: Well, will you look at that, another dwarven tablet. Why were the dragonkin out here stealing dwarven secrets?
KeysToEntries.Doric.FoundStatue.2: I guess we'll never know. Here, let me translate this for you, hopefully it'll help you on your travels.
KeysToEntries.Doric.FoundStatue.3: Well now, that is unexpected. This is the Salve amulet... why is this here? It requires a gemstone only found by the river Salve back in Misthalin. I mean, it's handy against the undead, so it'll be real useful here.
KeysToEntries.Doric.FoundStatue.4: Oh! Ha, you're gonna laugh at this, but I actually have one of them river Salve gemstones. I found one a few years back and I just keep it with me as a good luck charm. Here, you should take it, make yourself one of those salve amulets.
KeysToEntries.Doric.FoundStatue.HasInventorySpace.1: Hope it helps in your travels.
KeysToEntries.Doric.FoundStatue.DoesNotHaveInventorySp: Oh, you don't appear to have the space for it. Come back and see me when you do.
KeysToEntries.Quest.Name: Seeking Salvation
KeysToEntries.Quest.Description: Find the statues to gain entrance to the vault and uncover the secrets that lie within.
KeysToEntries.Objective.FindRecipe: Access the vault and find the hidden secret within.
KeysToEntries.Objective.ReturnToDoric: Bring the dwarven writing to Doric.
KeysToEntries.Objective.LookForDoric: Find someone in Fellhollow that can translate dwarvish text.
KeysToEntries.Doric.Name: Doric
KeysToEntries.Doric.PostQuest.1: Hope that amulet helps you out. There are a lot of them shamblin'orribles out there and anything to keep 'em off you feels like a good thing.
KeysToEntries.Statue.Discover.1: You find strange dwarven writings that you cannot read. Perhaps Doric can translate for you.
KeysToEntries.Statue.Discover.NotStarted.1: You find strange dwarven writings that you cannot read. Perhaps someone can translate for you.
KeysToEntries.Door.SealBroken: You hear the sound of a dragonkin lock releasing.
KeysToEntries.Crystal.Name: Salve Crystal
KeysToEntries.Crystal.Description: A crystal that Doric obtained from a cave near the river Salve, back in Misthalin. Used in creating the Salve amulet.
